column4: seems that 12.04 comes with the internal error message and asking permission  to report.. the way windows does??? :-(
No, the reports here go almost directly to launchpad.net, where they are triaged by developers and handled much quicker.
Please do report those, it's helpful to us.
excellent things though but kinda annoying, the app seems works fine but you see the message appears.. anyway i do think that this is more to positive parts than negative :)
